description: Provides information about any domain controllers in your directory.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: Identifier of the directory for which to retrieve the domain controller information.

parameters.name: DomainControllerIds
parameters.description: A list of identifiers for the domain controllers whose information will be provided. (string) ---

nested_items.name: DomainControllers
nested_items.description: List of the  DomainController objects that were retrieved.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the directory where the domain controller resides.

nested_items.name: DomainControllerId
nested_items.description: Identifies a specific domain controller in the directory.

nested_items.name: DnsIpAddr
nested_items.description: The IP address of the domain controller.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the VPC that contains the domain controller.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the subnet in the VPC that contains the domain controller.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone where the domain controller is located.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the domain controller.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: A description of the domain controller state.

nested_items.name: LaunchTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the domain controller was created.

nested_items.name: StatusLastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the status was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, more results are available. Pass this value for the NextToken parameter in a subsequent call to  DescribeDomainControllers retrieve the next set of items.
